xuiDialogService
service in module xui

Description

Service that provides modal/non-modal dialogs.

Methods

  • showError(dialogText)

    Shows the "error" specified in a modal dialog.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    dialogTextIDialogText

    Title and message for the dialog. E.g {title:"Important", message:"This is an important message."}

    Returns
    ng.IPromise<any>

    dialogResult

  • showMessage(dialogText)

    Shows the "body" specified in a modal dialog.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    dialogTextIDialogText

    Title and message for the dialog. E.g {title:"Important", message:"This is an important message."}

    Returns
    ng.IPromise<any>

    dialogResult

  • showModal(customSettings, dialogOptions)

    Displays a modal dialog, honoring the settings and options supplied.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    customSettingsng.ui.bootstrap.IModalSettings

    Presentation settings that govern the modal display.

    dialogOptionsIDialogOptions

    Dialog interaction/presentation options.

    Returns
    ng.IPromise<any>

    dialogResult

  • showWarning(dialogText, actionButton)

    Shows the "warning" specified in a modal dialog.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    dialogTextIDialogText

    Title and message for the dialog. E.g {title:"Important", message:"This is an important message."}

    actionButtonIDialogButton

    Button associated with the dialog action. Note that 'Cancel' will also be shown.

    Returns
    ng.IPromise<any>

    dialogResult

xuiDialogService Example
